p: Regarding EOs treatments, our results shown in Figure 1B agree with previous works, where weight loss was decreased in strawberry fruit treated with vapour TTO stored at 20 °C for 3 d [ 36]. Results in Figure 1B support our hypothesis that PMO could reduce the weight loss of green bean samples. The exogenous application of PMO on dragon fruit reduced water loss during storage at 25 °C for 21 d [ 12]. Water loss reduction by the application of EOs is primarily due to EOs acting as a semi-permeable layer, resulting in a decrease in the respiratory rate, evaporation, and transpiration [ 4].
